name: Super Pocket: Data East Edition
summary: Carry the ‘80s arcade in your pocket with the HyperMegaTech! Super Pocket Data East Edition! Features 18 arcade hits just as you remember them, including BurgerTime, Bad Dudes vs. Dragon Ninja, Joe & Mac: Caveman Ninja and more
